name: Holiday Inn Express North Conway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is in a good location, well maintained and rooms are comfortable. Reception staff were helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Good stopover

reviews.text: Standard HI Express breakfast is reasonably varied and always quickly replenished. It was very busy on the morning we were there but tables were speedily cleaned. Unfortunately several loud and unruly children were a little disruptive but that's not the hotel's fault.
reviews.title: Best Location in North Conway

reviews.text: We stayed July 4th Weekend.. and really enjoyed the large, clean room, swimming pool, breakfast bar and short walk to the OVP. The rate was also excellent. We've stayed at the North Conway Grand, Comfort Inn and White Mountain - HI Express gives the best value and most comfortable stay in the area.
reviews.title: Pleasant Service was enjoyed
Good Value
reviews.text: My family and I stayed 1 night at this Holiday in Express in North Conway.Check in was
great.Very pleasant man checked us in about 1/2 hr.before 4 pm time.Virtually no lines to
reviews.title: Back Again to Ski

aka: Holiday Inn Express North Conway Hotel North Conway
